data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Menot, Lenaick, Segonzac, Michel (2016): New records of caridean shrimp (Crustacea: Decapoda) from hydrothermally influenced fields off Futuna Island, Southwest Pacific, with description of a new species assigned to the genus Alvinocaridinides Komai & Chan, 2010 (Alvinocarididae). Zootaxa 4098 (2): 298-310, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4098.2.5
